title: Environmental justice impacts of historical redlining in Los Angeles County
text: 1930 map of Los Angeles County neighborhoods divided into Home Owners’ Loan Corporation (HOLC) grades A (green; desirable) to D (red; undesirable). Photograph courtesy of Mapping Inequality

title: Kristin Art
text:
Hi there!
My name is Kristin and I am an environmental scientist who loves playing with data! I created this website to share my professional skills and personal hobbies with people like you, so thanks for stopping by.



Education
MS in Environmental Science & Management (expected 2024) University of California, Santa Barbara
BS in Biological Sciences (2019) University of Southern California



Experience
Environmental Trainee (2023-present) Environmental Protection Agency, Washington, DC
Environmental Analyst (2020-2022) San Francisco Estuary Institute, Richmond, CA
